=======
Storage
=======
Storage library provides python classes/functions to interact with `Enterprise Storage Arrays and Switches<http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enterprise_storage/>`_ and Servers.

Documentation
=============
Visit `http://docs.enterprisestorage.in/en/latest/<http://docs.enterprisestorage.in/en/latest/>`_ to view documentation,
report bugs and obtain help.
